overview.en: Lend0X gathers professionals in the field of traditional financial, Internet financial and block chain. And regarding traditional finance as the business base, and block chain distributed accounting, tamper-resistant manner, intelligent contracts and cross chain as the technology base, it builds a platform to achieve rapid circulation between the digital encryption assets and the real economy and help users to manage assets - Lend0X.
overview.zh: Lend0X汇聚传统金融、互联网金融以及区块链领域的专业人才，以传统金融为业务基础，以区块链的分布式记账、不可篡改、智能合约以及跨链为技术基础，构建了一个实现数字加密资产与实体经济快速流通以及帮助用户实现资产管理的平台—-Lend0X。
